# Government Tender Announcement

### Tender Details

| English Field | French Field | Value |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | Numéro de sollicitation | W8482-229799/B |
| Tender Closing Date | Date limite d'appel d'offres | 2022-10-12 14:00:00 EST |
| Amendment Number | Numéro de modification | 2 |
| Reference Number | Numéro de référence | PW-22-01003760 |
| Publication Date | Date de publication | 2022-08-10 |
| Tender Status | Statut de l'appel d'offres | Expired |

### Procurement Details

* Category: Goods
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* GSN Codes: N4810, N4820
* GSN Descriptions: Valves, Powered; Valves, Nonpowered; Valves, Ball; Valves, Globe; Valves, Float; Valves, Stop-Check
* UNSPSC Codes: N/A
* UNSPSC Descriptions: N/A

### Contract Details

* Contracting Entity: Department of National Defence
* Contracting Entity Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON, K1A0K2
* End-User Entity: Department of National Defence
* End-User Entity Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON, K1A0K2
* Contact Information: Darrell Hill, darrell.hill@forces.gc.ca
